name: UpdateUrlProtectionBypass
description:
Update the protection bypass for a Vercel URL.

Use this tool to update the protection bypass for an alias or deployment URL in Vercel, enabling user or comment access on preview deployments.

parameters.name: alias_or_deployment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the alias or deployment for which to update the protection bypass.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team on whose behalf the request is made.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The team slug representing which team the request should be performed for in Vercel.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: protection_bypass_details
parameters.description: JSON object specifying the details for updating the protection bypass. This may include settings for user access and comment permissions.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.
